content: ipod shuffle arm band crochet an ipod shuffle arm band in less than 15 minutes supplies needed scrap yarn and whatever size hook works best with that yarn i just crocheted a strip using double_crochet behind the posts to make a stretchy arm band approx 20 chains double_crochet in third chain from hook work as many row as needed to fit around upper arm by working bpdc in each double_crochet from previous row join the ends with a slip_stitch make a small square with single_crochet leaving a tail long enough to sew it onto the arm band it s useful to have your subjects arm available to size the band also the ipod shuffle to check the pocket you could go without the pocket seeing the shuffle will clip on you could also make it wider to fit other mp3 players and what not i think i ll try one for my husband s insulin pump so it stays put while he s sleeping probably not in pink though - © j leonard happyhooking 2008
